title: Costs
context: §662-9 Costs. In an action under this chapter, court costs and fees as set by law may be allowed to the prevailing party. [L 1957, c 312, pt of §1; Supp, §245A-9; HRS §662-9; am L 1972, c 164, §2&copy;; am L 1979, c 152, §3] Case Notes This section and §662-12 not inconsistent as to attorney&rsquo;s fees. 51 H. 540, 465 P.2d 580 (1970).
